title: Strengthening Service Quality Competencies: Short-Intensive Mobile Learning Application Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Software Development Knowledge (Requirements Analysis, UI/UX Design), Foundational Learning Theories
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the ADDIE instructional design model when designing M-Learning applications.
Learners can design mobile-friendly language learning content (quizzes, pronunciation assessments, situational dialogues).
Learners can create responsive UI prototypes using Figma/Adobe XD tools.
Learners can plan weekly sprints and conduct MVP testing according to Agile methodology.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
